title: If you are in the military stationed overseas don't buy RCA products!

title: Zero Customer Service, I would not recommend RCA Products

fullText: recently tried 3 rca products 3 call rca customer service talking india barely speaks english doesnt care bought rca mp3 players contrary reliably play wma mp3 songs mixed unable answer rca fix lucky able return unit refund
